parameters.name: AccessConfigurationId
parameters.description: The ID of the access configuration.

parameters.name: PrincipalId
parameters.description:
The ID of the CloudSSO identity.

*   If you set `PrincipalType` to `User`, set `PrincipalId` to the ID of the CloudSSO user.
*   If you set `PrincipalType` to `Group`, set `PrincipalId` to the ID of the CloudSSO group.

parameters.name: PrincipalType
parameters.description:
The type of the CloudSSO identity. Valid values:

*   User
*   Group

parameters.name: TargetId
parameters.description: The ID of the task object.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description: The type of the task object. Set the value to RD-Account, which specifies the accounts in the resource directory.
